titles.title: A bill to permit an increase in the maximum speed limit to 65 miles per hour on highways in States which require the use of seat belts in the front seats of automobiles.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.
Referred to Subcommittee on Surface Transportation.

bill.summary: 1/8/1987--Introduced. Amends Federal law to permit an increase in the maximum speed limit to 65 miles per hour on highways in States that require the use of seat belts by front seat automobile passengers.
